snippet: The “Demmy Awards,” a ceremony for the New York County Democratic Committee, honored politicians and labor leaders, and attracted many mayoral hopefuls.
abstract: Trailside blog; tongue-in-cheek Demmy Awards, fund-raiser for New York County Democratic Committee, honors politicians and labor leaders, and attracts many mayoral hopefuls.
lead_paragraph: The “Demmy Awards,” a ceremony for the New York County Democratic Committee, honored politicians and labor leaders, and attracted many mayoral hopefuls.

headline.main: At Democratic Fund-Raiser, Talk of Politics on Red Carpet
headline.print_headline:
Red Carpet Politics
At a Fund-Raiser
